column4: hey, someone knows about madwifi cards? yesterday someone helped me to start the card but today i restarted the computer and its not working at all. there is even no such ath0 device.
which modules i have to load for madwifi? ath_pci?
ok, than its seem the module is kinda broken
would it help you to look at your history of commands from yesterday?
i've tried to use the commands from yesterday, but they did nothing
i have compiled it, if you mean this. i was just using the stuff from apt
i think i need the ath_hal
i'm back in a minute, i'll try something
i got it to work. the module was not correct build due to the fact i've put it in restricted_modules conf file
cool. Glad you are all set.
don't know why, but i think there was a tutorial, i was trying yesterday which told me to
i wonder if its possible to be online with eth0 and ath0 at the same time. right now i can only choose one of them with wicd
